actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a partial interest exclusion for taxable years beginning in 1983 or 1984.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code, as amended by the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981, to exclude $200 ($400 for joint returns) of annual interest income from gross income in taxable years beginning after 1982 and ending before 1985.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a partial interest exclusion for taxable years beginning in 1983 or 1984.
